text: Jan Sierada (Born May 13 1879) was a Belarusian politician who served as a president and PM during 1918- he was a notable figure in the place. In 1940 he was imprisoned but freed in 1941 then exiled- after that- no one knows his fate, this event happened on Nov 19 1943. Category:Belarusian politicians
title: Jan Sierada
